name: House Selection Toro
additionalNotes: George Hamilton, star of stage, screen and TV is the man behind these flavorful and affordable premium cigars with the fancy bands. A descendant of one of Virginias original tobacco farming families, George knows good cigars and this selection is blended with the finest Piloto Cubano ligero and Seco fillers, a mild Olor binder and a lightly spicy Indonesian wrapper for a rich-tasting, well-balanced cigar of outstanding quality.
